subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
Agents (Business)
lead_paragraph: A group of prominent college coaches joined in a conference call with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell, the N.C.A.A. and others to address problems with unscrupulous agents that have led to investigations at several universities this summer.
snippet: A group of prominent college coaches joined in a conference call with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell, the N.C.A.A. and others to address problems with unscrupulous agents that have led to investigations at several universities this summer.
